description:
Hana has been taken hostage by Hiroesue.  And at the same time, Ai, one of the Planetary Gears, takes control of the debris in orbit and uses it to attack the Tenkaidou.  Teppei goes to stop it in the Nebula engine, but his machine is damaged.  Daichi is forced to use the Earth Engine`s new weapon, the Boosted Plasmagnum, to destroy it.
Source: crunchyroll
